content: By default, there is a "Send Feedback" button in the top right. It does not appear in this chat room. I do not see in the back-end or in the doc where I can remove this. Can someone tell me? Thank you.
@SSD It's controlled by ENABLE_FEEDBACK, which I believe defaults to false in /etc/zulip/settings.py.
(I'm a bit confused as to how you had it enabled by accident)
@Tim Abbott I assume it was the default. I will be re-installing soon on a permanent server. I will confirm then.
@Tim Abbott On reinstall this option was not enabled by default. I guess I changed it thinking it was something else?
OK, that's a pretty reasonable explanation. Sounds like we should consider clarifying what it does :smiley:
